scenes.description: A golden retriever puppy, Barnaby, hides under a kitchen table during a fierce thunderstorm, pressing against the legs of his owner, Lily, as lightning flashes outside the window.
Driven by a faint cry, Barnaby pushes his way out of a doggy door into the raging storm, facing the wind and slanting rain in the muddy garden.
Under a thorny rose bush, Barnaby finds a tiny, shivering black and white kitten. He gently picks up the kitten by its scruff to carry it to safety.
Inside the warm kitchen, Lily kneels and hugs her muddy hero, Barnaby. The rescued kitten sleeps safely curled up against the puppy on a rug.
